1370: Voghel moved to Appel Marckt.A.2 after marriage.
Got married to Gisele at age 35 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Gisele, Siburgis, at age 35.
1371: Had a son with Gisele, Kerolus, at age 36.
1373: Had a daughter with Gisele, Mabelie, at age 38.
1374: Had a son with Gisele, Seukinus, at age 39.
1377: Had a son with Gisele, Amelgeir, at age 42.
1379: Lost his wife Gisele while she was giving birth to Heylewigis in 1379.
Became caretaker of Siburgis, Kerolus, Mabelie, Seukinus, Amelgeir, Heylewigis at age 45.
